name: 1989 QianShanMen
description:
*This game content is purely fictional. Any resemblance is purely coincidental.


In a distant realm, there lies a mysterious and beautiful country known as the Winter Country...
Currently, Winter Country is under the control of a political party called the "Dongshan Party"...
And on Winter Calendar June 4th, 1989, an event unfolded at the QianShanMen Square...

Faced with the oppression of the Dongshan Party... people finally rise up for revolution...

Utilize on-field props and mechanisms to solve puzzles!


Keep running, jumping! Reach the finish line!
